input: List all prenote entries that have been created in the last month and are valid for the bank account with UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef.

output.sql: SELECT * FROM BankAccountPrenoteEntry WHERE BankAccountUUID = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' AND ValidIndicator = TRUE AND ValidityStartDate >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month';
